description: Keep it high and tight with the zipper up or go a little more casual by dropping it down. Either way, this men’s sweater will feel good, look great, and help keep you warm on those cooler days. With a subtle knit pattern and contrast striping at the collar, this sweater offers just enough visual appeal. And, because it’s made from recycle polyester, it’s eco-conscious as well.
name: Smartwool Ripple Ridge Stripe Half Zip Sweater - Mens
